org.cloudgraph.state

Class StateValidatingDataBinding

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.cloudgraph.state.StateValidatingDataBinding
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ValidatingDataBinding

    public class StateValidatingDataBinding
extends java.lang.Object
implements ValidatingDataBinding
    State JAXB Binding delegate. It is crucial that this binding be cached by service implementations at the appropriate level to 1.) guarantee thread safety (this class is NOT thread safe) and 2.) re-use the underlying JAXB context and parsed schema instance(s) across as many requests as possible.
    Since:
    0.5.2
    Author:
    Scott Cinnamond
